Π_totality: Π maps all admissible states into {⊥, ⊤} or composite truth states consistent with Ω.
Θ_polarity_integrity: Θ+ and Θ- must never both be assigned simultaneously to a single PolarityAtom.
no_spontaneous_contradiction: No sequence of allowed operations may map ⊤ to ⊥ without explicit contradiction input.
